thoughtText: Ghost of Tsushima it's mind-blowing, the gameplay is so addictive that I lost track of time!
Elden Ring was 450 hours of my CPU gasping for oxygen, 11/10.
I spent over 1000 hours and I still don't know how to play.
On BioShock Infinite you don't beat the game, the game beats you.
Why they keep making Super hero games?.
Metal Gear it's kinda like Pokemon but you collect soviet soldiers, LOL
PUG it's fun and challenging for both you and your PC.
How do I upgrade my gaming PC
Woke up this morning and spent a thousand dollars on genshin AMA
Why is modern warfare 3 so bad?
